Parameters: {commentText: string; curriculumFacet: boolean; curriculumSection: string; documentKey: string; documentTitle: string; documentType: string; documentUid: string}
Description: A user places the first comment on a given document (e.g. the problem, teacher guide, their own teaching/planning documents, a peer’s teaching/planning documents)

Parameters: {commentText: string; curriculumFacet: boolean; curriculumSection: string; documentKey: string; documentTitle: string; documentType: string; documentUid: string}
Description: A user places the first comment on a specific tile (e.g. text tile, graphing tool, image) within any document (e.g. the problem, teacher guide, the user’s own teaching/planning documents, a peer’s teaching/planning documents).

Parameters: {commentText: string; curriculumFacet: boolean; curriculumSection: string; documentKey: string; documentTitle: string; documentType: string; documentUid: string}
Description: A user places any additional comments on a given document (e.g. the problem, teacher guide, their own teaching/planning documents, a peer’s teaching/planning documents)

Parameters: {commentText: string; curriculumFacet: boolean; curriculumSection: string; documentKey: string; documentTitle: string; documentType: string; documentUid: string}
Description: A user places any additional comments on a specific tile (e.g. text tile, graphing tool, image) that has already been commented on. These tiles can be in any type of document (e.g. the problem, teacher guide, the user’s own teaching/planning documents, a peer’s teaching/planning documents).

Parameters: {loadingMeasurements: object; documentMeasurements: object}
Description: Upon load of CLUE, loading and document measurements are logged. Loading measurements are time based and in milliseconds and relate to the timing performance of CLUE startup. Document measurements (either # of tiles or docs) count the number of tiles (as well as tile type) and number of documents on the left and right side that were loaded.
